archiefmat.titel: Colonial Office and predecessors: General Entry Books, Series I
archiefmat.titel_eng: Colonial Office and predecessors: general entry books, series I
archiefmat.scope: This series contains entry books of correspondence regarding the colonies but not usually directed to the governors. Entries include instructions, petitions, grants and letters (many of a private and unofficial nature). Early volumes contain both incoming and outgoing correspondence but later volumes only outgoing. Includes Board of Trade records for the earlier period.
